headline: Bio-Techne Advances Spatial Biology Solutions Bridging Translational Research to Clinical Applications
summary: Bio-Techne Corporation (NASDAQ: TECH), a global provider of life science tools, reagents and diagnostic products, today announced new advancements in its spatial biology portfolio for the RNAscope™ ISH technology and the Lunaphore COMET™. These solutions help researchers and pathologists bridge the gap between translational research and clinical applications by enabling the detection of RNA and protein biomarkers on the same tissue section.
